channel.title: Anti-Hero on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Anti-Hero on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: 'Baby Steps' Is a Hiking Game That Trolls ‘Slightly Problematic’ Men
item.description: The walking simulator, launching September 23 on PlayStation and Steam, stars a jobless 35-year-old “privileged, white male” whose pride stops him from getting help.
